reviewText: One of a few DVD's regarding History and Military Channel Show's I purchased my husband for Fathers Day. I found myself enjoying them as much as he has, and I know he watches them at least every other weekend even now. My husband has a very organized DVD/BLU-RAY Collection of over 250 Documentaries, Classic Movies, Movies, Classic T.V. Series and more modern T.V. Series. Most certainly a recommend regarding DVD and purchasing through Amazon to family, friends and other etc.....
